attributes.action: Call for a General Election in 2021
attributes.additional_details: What the government has done due to COVID-19 has destroyed peoples lives, the economy and taken away our freedoms. They need to be held accountable. They are not telling the truth and continue to enforce and oppress peoples lives due to there own beliefs
attributes.background: Action a general election early in 2021. So the public can decide whether the Conservative party and its leaders are making the right decisions around COVID-19.
